## UserAgent.stop() method

Gracefully close. Gracefully disconnect from network transport.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stop(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`

## Remarks

Unregisters and terminates active sessions/subscriptions.
